bill.title: FOCA Act Fair and Open Competition Act
bill.description: To preserve open competition and Federal Government neutrality towards the labor relations of Federal Government contractors on Federal and federally funded construction projects, and for other purposes.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 20.

calendar.description: House Committee on Oversight and Accountability Hearing
